description: Portrait vase representing kneeling female figure.  The nose is modeled, but the other features, as well as arms and costume details are painted in polychrome on a red ground.  A single large spout emerges from between shoulders in back.  Spout decorated with three painted bands of conventionalized trophy heads; of herringbone design; of weapons (?).  Note method of wearing bead band shown in this pot.  Hole on one side.
title: Portrait vase in the form of a female figure
